abstract.t: This document gives information on an RTCP Packet Type and RTCP XRBlock Type including associated SDP parameters for inter-destinationmedia synchronization (IDMS). The RTCP XR Block Type, registered withIANA based on an ETSI specification, is used to collect media play-out information from participants in a group playing-out (watching,listening, etc.) a specific RTP media stream. The RTCP packet typespecified by this document is used to distribute a summary of thecollected information so that the participants can synchronize play-out.Typical applications for IDMS are social TV, shared service control(i.e. applications where two or more geographically separated usersare watching a media stream together), distance learning, networkquiz shows, multi-playing online games, etc.
